title: News: Death Cab For Cutie Live Music Video
body:
**Death Cab For Cutie** have just released photos of the band prepping for tonight’s shoot.

After the release of the first single from their forthcoming LP _Codes and Keys_, ‘_You are a Tourist_’, the band announced that the video accompanying the tune would be aired simultaneously to it being shot. Fairly ambitious!

The video will be aired at 7 p.m. EST over at [www.youareatourist.com](http://www.youareatourist.com/) and will be directed by _Tim Nackashi_. Check out the single below and be sure to watch it being filmed tonight!

 [DEATH CAB for CUTIE – You Are A Tourist \[Album Version\]](http://soundcloud.com/atlanticrecords/death-cab-for-cutie-you-are-a) by [ATL REC.](http://soundcloud.com/atlanticrecords)
